name: Dizilab Remove Ads - 2017
description: Removes multiple advertiments from pages. Tested with Chrome and Opera
additional_info:
Removes multiple advertiments from dizilab. Tested with Chrome but should work for every browsers.

* Supported Browsers : Chrome,Firefox,Opera,Baidu
* Don't forget to check updates.

Changelog
* 11.03.2017 Updated for the new domain (dizilab.net)
* 30.07.2017 Updated for new ads
* 11.09.2017 Updated for the new domain (dizilab.me)
* 27.09.2017 Updated for the new domain (dizilab.net)
* 11.01.2018 Updated for new ads

Known Issues
* Pre-video ads
* Daily pop-up
